Row.Text: Requires 1 [ICON_RES_COAL] Coal. +15% [ICON_PRODUCTION] Production in City. +1 [ICON_PRODUCTION] Production and +1 [ICON_GOLD] Gold from all Ocean and Coastal tiles. +2 [ICON_PRODUCTION] Production and [ICON_GOLD] Gold from Sea Resources worked by this City.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]City must be built on the coast, and cannot have a Train Station in the City.

The unique Peking Field Force replaces the Great War Infantry for Great Qing. Unlike the Great War Infantry, this unit is unlocked at Nationalism and is also trained at double the normal speed in the Capital. If upgraded from a Rifleman, this unit earns promotions 15% faster. These units will prove an effective last-line of defense against foes threatening the capital.

What is to account for our failures to modernize against our foes? The Imperial Exams. This system has left our government without the technical and bureaucratic creativity that we need. If we are to take our first step into modernity, we must do-away with this outdated institution. [NEWLINE]------------------------- [NEWLINE][COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Requirements:[ENDCOLOR] [NEWLINE]------------------------- [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Player must be Great Qing. [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]May only be enacted from the beginning of the Industrial Era. [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]May only be enacted once per game. [NEWLINE]------------------------- [NEWLINE][COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Costs:[ENDCOLOR] [NEWLINE]------------------------- [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]{1_Num} [ICON_GOLD] Gold. [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]{2_Num} [ICON_MAGISTRATES] Magistrates. [NEWLINE]------------------------- [NEWLINE][COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Rewards:[ENDCOLOR] [NEWLINE]------------------------- [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]-15% [ICON_CULTURE] Social Policy cost. [NEWLINE][NEWLINE][COLOR_WARNING_TEXT]Note: The [ICON_MAGISTRATES] Magistrates cost increases with every Policy Branch you have completed.

{1_LeaderName} of {2_CivName} has abolished the centuries-old tradition of the imperial examinations.

We may cherish the old worldview, but we cannot deny that our foes have far surpassed us in terms of military strengths. If we are to survive into the modern age, then we must concede to the officers that would instruct and arm our soldiers in the style of our foes. ------------------------- [NEWLINE][COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Requirements:[ENDCOLOR] [NEWLINE]------------------------- [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Player must be Great Qing. [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]May only be enacted from the beginning of the Renaissance Era. [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]May only be enacted once per game. [NEWLINE]------------------------- [NEWLINE][COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Costs:[ENDCOLOR] [NEWLINE]------------------------- [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]{1_Num} [ICON_GOLD] Gold. [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]1 [ICON_MAGISTRATES] Magistrates. [NEWLINE]------------------------- [NEWLINE][COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Rewards:[ENDCOLOR] [NEWLINE]------------------------- [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Construct XP-giving Buildings 50% faster.
